name: Apple
description: Crispy and sweet fruit that comes in multiple shades of green and red

name: Banana
description: A long bendy fruit that comes in a yellow peel

name: Orange
description: Was the fruit named after the colour, or was the colour named after the fruit?

name: Kiwi
description: A small fruit covered in a fuzzy brown skin

name: Pineapple
description: Spiky on the outside, sweet and juicy on the inside
